duties_responsibilities.duty: Architect and design software solutions using various technologies such as Java, Go, Spring, Angular, Python, PostgreSQL, AI tech, and AWS.
Meet with clients to understand complex problems and reinvent the way companies manage risk, compliance, and data.
Provide overall technical architecture vision for the Platform solution and create Technical Architecture Blueprints.
Review business requirements and align scope with existing capabilities to meet client needs.
Ensure successful alignment with software engineering process and provide leadership for a team of software engineers.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, Computer Engineering, or equivalent. Master’s preferred.
